video.title: Pound Puppies
video.synopsis: Lucky, Cookie and the rest of the dogs in Shelter 17 have an important secret mission: to help every dog that comes to the pound find a new home.

episodes.synopsis: When a seemingly unmatchable pup finds and then loses the boy of his dreams, it's up to the Pound Puppies to do what they do best.
episodes.title: The Yipper Caper

episodes.synopsis: While McLeish is tasked with taking care of his bratty niece and nephew on Halloween, the puppies have to place a sweet but scary looking dog.
episodes.title: Nightmare on Pound Street

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies hustle to find a home for Rebound, the most energetic pup they've ever seen.
episodes.title: Rebound

episodes.synopsis: The mysterious Pound Puppy general arrives at the shelter with a daunting assignment for Lucky and the gang.
episodes.title: The General

episodes.synopsis: Feeling unappreciated, Squirt switches places with an aristocratic dog that looks just like him.
episodes.title: The Prince and the Pupper

episodes.synopsis: It's the Pound Puppies vs. the Kennel Kitties as each side tries to place one of their own in a home.
episodes.title: Catcalls

episodes.synopsis: When there's a mix-up at the pound, Niblet is mistakenly adopted as the new junkyard dog.
episodes.title: King of the Heap

episodes.synopsis: Agatha enters Rebound in a dog show to prove that she's top dog.
episodes.title: My Fair Rebound

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies struggle to find a home for five adorable puppies that are determined to stay together.
episodes.title: Quintuplets

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies return a circus dog that was left behind. When they get to the Big Top, Strudel has the chance to fulfill her dream of performing.
episodes.title: Dog on a Wire

episodes.synopsis: When Squirt and Niblet become lost and stranded in the middle of nowhere, the Pound Puppies scramble to find them.
episodes.title: Homeward Pound

episodes.synopsis: When a coyote is accidentally brought into the shelter, Cookie becomes smitten and contemplates leaving the pound with him.
episodes.title: Rebel Without a Collar

episodes.synopsis: It's up to the Pound Puppies to find a home for a dog who's convinced he's nothing but bad luck.
episodes.title: Taboo

episodes.synopsis: Strudel meets a kindred spirit when a robot dog named Toyoshiko arrives at the pound.
episodes.title: Toyoshiko! Bark Friend Machine

episodes.synopsis: After getting separated from his family during an outing, Zoltron seeks the gang's help to be reunited with his family, who may not be from Earth.
episodes.title: Zoltron

episodes.synopsis: Rover seeks help from Lucky and the gang to find his person. But Rover isn't any ordinary dog: In fact, he's not a dog at all.
episodes.title: The Really Weird Dog

episodes.synopsis: McLeish's mother leaves Rebound at the pound while she's away on vacation.
episodes.title: Bone Voyage

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies become a sled-dog team to help a hopeful pup meet his person.
episodes.title: Snow Problem

episodes.synopsis: Despite not being the right breed or size, Pepper is determined to become a police dog.
episodes.title: The K9 Kid

episodes.synopsis: Squirt recounts the story of how Mr. Nut Nut became a member of the Pound Puppies.
episodes.title: The Call of the Squirrel Dog

episodes.synopsis: When Niblet brings a new pup and his older partner to the shelter to hide them from a dogcatcher, Lucky is forced to deal with family ties.
episodes.title: I Never Barked for My Father

episodes.synopsis: Placing pups becomes a challenge for the gang when the pound's former manager, the no-nonsense Milton Feltwadle, returns to run Shelter 17.
episodes.title: McLeish Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies play cupid for Olaf and Gertrude in the hopes they'll adopt a new pup that needs a home.
episodes.title: Olaf in Love

episodes.synopsis: Squirt goes undercover disguised as a cat to recover Strudel's new invention, which was stolen by the Kennel Kitties.
episodes.title: Kennel Kittens Return

episodes.synopsis: Lucky and the gang are dumbfounded when they learn that Cookie has been trying to thwart the adoption of a pup.
episodes.title: Mutternal Instincts

episodes.synopsis: When a lonesome little girl adopts Lucky, he'll do anything to get back to Shelter 17 -- which includes revealing the secret mission.
episodes.title: Lucky Gets Adopted

episodes.synopsis: The gang heads to the beach to place a pup named Zipper with an overcompetitive Zoomit flying-disc champ.
episodes.title: Zipper the Zoomit Dog

episodes.synopsis: After Agatha's new boyfriend suggests Rebound needs a friend, she takes in adorable pup Princess. But is Princess as sweet as she seems to be?
episodes.title: The Fraud Princess

episodes.synopsis: A new arrival, Patches, recruits Rebound and Cupcake to get him adopted, and they soon wreak havoc throughout the city.
episodes.title: The Super Secret Pup Club

episodes.synopsis: When the influence of a charming but lazy newcomer, Barlow, rubs off on the Pound Puppies, Lucky must roust the crew out of their lethargy.
episodes.title: Barlow

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies must find Camelia's perfect person before conniving McLeish pawns her off to a stuffy old politician.
episodes.title: There's Something About Camelia

episodes.synopsis: After hypnotizing McLeish into thinking that he's a dog, the gang must find a way to change him back into his old self.
episodes.title: Good Dog, McLeish!

episodes.synopsis: Fearing that he's not tough enough, Rebound joins the Ruff Ruff Bunch, a gang of rough-and-tumble lap dogs led by a Chihuahua named Cuddlesworth.
episodes.title: The Ruff Ruff Bunch

episodes.synopsis: Salty, an old sea dog, enlists the gang to help him find a replacement dog for his owner, Captain Pete.
episodes.title: Salty

episodes.synopsis: When Niblet befriends a parrot who repeats everything he hears, Niblet has to stop the bird from spilling the Pound Puppies' secrets all over town.
episodes.title: Squawk

episodes.synopsis: When a film clip of Rebound singing and dancing makes him an Internet sensation, the gang must trick everyone into thinking the video was faked.
episodes.title: The Accidental Pup Star

episodes.synopsis: When a new landlord bans all dogs from his building, the Pound Puppies try to convince him to change his mind.
episodes.title: No Dogs Allowed

episodes.synopsis: When a pregnant dog comes to the pound, a surprised Lucky and the rest of the gang must find a way to help her deliver her litter.
episodes.title: Pound Preemies

episodes.synopsis: Discovering that they must find homes for thousands of puppies by morning, Rebound and the gang get to work and hope for a Christmas miracle...
episodes.title: I Heard the Barks on Christmas Eve

episodes.synopsis: Dolores can't have a pup until she's proven to her dad that she's responsible by delivering newspapers; and she's terrible at it! The Pound Puppies swing into action to help, and discover the surprising secret to her, uh, lack of success.
episodes.title: Working K-9 to 5

episodes.synopsis: An adorable pup named Buttercup looks just like the biggest toy sensation around, Cuddle Up Buttercup. But when kids think she's the toy come to life, the Pound Puppies need to find her perfect person before she gets nabbed!
episodes.title: Cuddle Up Buttercup

episodes.synopsis: British Pound Puppy agent Bondo shows up in style and the Super Secret Pup Club is blown away. When they accidentally fly off to London, Lucky and Bondo team up to find them and to place puppy Yakov in their most high-stakes mission yet.
episodes.title: The Pups Who Loved Me

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies sneak into a museum to place pup Millie with Amelia, the curator's granddaughter. But when the lights go out, Niblet and Squirt find themselves separated from the gang and face to face with the awakened cat mummy Meowtuhotep!
episodes.title: Fright at the Museum

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies are set to place Puddles with his outgoing person Sam but there's a problem. He's not housebroken! The Pound Puppies are at a loss, until they realize that their solution might lie with Sam himself.
episodes.title: Puddles the Problem Pup

episodes.synopsis: When Boots' perfect person Chucky gets in trouble at school for something he claims he didn't do, the Super Secret Pup Club enlist police-pup Pepper to help them investigate and clear his name.
episodes.title: It's Elementary My Dear Pup Club

episodes.synopsis: When a smooth talking Chihuahua, Antonio, transfers to the pound and starts flirting with Cookie and Strudel, confusion and hurt feelings threaten to break up the team, and keep Pupster the puppy from ever meeting his person.
episodes.title: Hot Dawg!

episodes.synopsis: When Pooches the TV sitcom pup runs away from the studio for a break from her busy showbiz life, Cupcake is substituted in her place. But when Pooches wants her old life back, a star-struck Cupcake just might not go along with it.
episodes.title: I'm Ready for my Close Pup

episodes.synopsis: Girl sheepdog Giblet arrives at the pound in need of a person. But when she meets Niblet, it's love at first sight. After Giblet is adopted by a sheep farmer, Niblet takes off on an epic journey to reclaim her, and possibly never come back.
episodes.title: When Niblet Met Giblet

episodes.synopsis: After being mistaken for a superhero, Strudel begins a double life as Electronoggin, nocturnal protector of downtrodden dogs. But will her new night job keep her from doing her day job of finding pups their people? Tune in to find out!
episodes.title: The Watchdogs

episodes.synopsis: The Super Secret Pup Club runs afoul of the Kennel Kittens when they decide to help a little kitten named Spoons find her perfect person. It's a strange and eerie trek for the pups that takes them... straight through cat territory!
episodes.title: Hello Kitten

episodes.synopsis: Persnickety Agent Ping challenges Strudel to find the perfect home for the rambunctious pup, Chief. Strudel eagerly accepts until she finds out that Chief's perfect people are... the President's daughters! Who live inside the White House!
episodes.title: Hail to the Chief

episodes.synopsis: When the dogs start to suspect that Ralph is intentionally trying to ruin their plans, Lucky enlists his help on an adoption mission to see how loyal he is. But things go from bad to worse, and it seems that Ralph actually might be a double-agent.
episodes.title: Once a Ralph, Always a Ralph

episodes.synopsis: When heroic rescue dog Champ arrives at the pound without his hair, he dons a full-body dog toupee to boost his chances of getting adopted.
episodes.title: Beauty is Only Fur Deep

episodes.synopsis: Patches' old friends Bart and Tony show up and harass him for hanging out with Rebound and Cupcake, so Lucky hatches an adventure-filled plan to not only find Bart and Tony their perfect person but to show them how awesome girl pups really can be.
episodes.title: All Bark and Little Bite

episodes.synopsis: After an accident with Strudel's electronic scrambling device transforms Lucky into a simpleton and threatens the adoptions of many puppies, Niblet must decide whether to keep his new best friend or give him up for the good of the pups.
episodes.title: Lucky the Dunce

episodes.synopsis: Pup Millard is so shy he's too scared to even get adopted. So when he accidentally ends up on a camping trip with the High Energy Scouts, the Pound Puppies hope they can find his perfect person and escape before the scouts overwhelm him for good!
episodes.title: No More S'Mores

episodes.synopsis: Nothing can snap Bert, former star of the TV show "McBowser," out of his grumpy funk until Jackpot and his person Emily find themselves stuck in a runaway electric wheelchair. It's McBowser to the rescue in a wild action chase through the city.
episodes.title: Back in Action

episodes.synopsis: When Cookie loses Strudel's super-hearing electronic Hearmuffs, McLeish finds them and starts hearing strange things. Soon he thinks the dogs are aliens and his investigation puts their entire operation at risk.
episodes.title: The Truth is in Hear

episodes.synopsis: Sweet Pea and Hairy are the perfect pups for sibling ping pong stars Ruby and Leo. Unfortunately the pups can't stand each other. Their fighting spreads to Leo and Ruby and the Pound Puppies must now save an adoption and a ping pong championship!
episodes.title: Double Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Noodles the pup feels left out when his humans bring home a baby named J.D. He asks the Pound Puppies to help and they better work fast. Because meanwhile Noodles comes up with a crazy plan of his own, to get rid of J.D. for good.
episodes.title: Little Monster

episodes.synopsis: The Pound Puppies need to place YoYo with his perfect person, Sumalee. But a dispute between Agatha and Sumalee's mother makes this nearly impossible. That is until Sumalee and YoYo's beautiful music helps bring peace to the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Rebound's First Symphony

episodes.synopsis: A Pound Puppy mission turns into an island adventure when the gang stow away on Agatha's yacht. When the yacht runs aground, adventure-loving pup Solo wanders into the jungle, and the Pound Puppies must go in and find him...
episodes.title: Lord of the Fleas

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by a motivational speaker, Niblet senses that three unique pups, Axel, Stuffy and Schleppy, need to embrace their differences so he leads them off on a perilous journey of self-discovery, to see the mysterious Doggy Lama.
episodes.title: The Road to Empawerment

episodes.synopsis: Pound Puppy Agent Miss Stiffwhiskers brings Lucky before a Pound Puppy tribunal for breaking Pound Puppy rules. A guilty verdict means the end of Shelter 17!
episodes.title: The Pupple's Court

episodes.synopsis: When Dot's dad gets a promotion, Lucky realizes he and Dot will have to move to another city. It'll mean breaking up the Pound Puppy team! So the Pound Puppies embark on a mission to jinx the promotion and keep Lucky in town.
episodes.title: Lucky Has to Move
